trans-unit.source: Fortune's Favor
trans-unit.target: Fortune's Favor

trans-unit.resname: F17·2 | Fortune's Favor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target opponent looks at the top four cards of your library and separates them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Target opponent looks at the top four cards of your library and separates them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

trans-unit.source: Uncertainty has its own allure.

trans-unit.target: Incendiary Flow

trans-unit.resname: F17·3 | Incendiary Flow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

trans-unit.source: "What's your plan?" Gideon asked. "Are you serious?" Chandra replied.
